nodes.text: A squad of the best Imperial shock troopers under the command of Commander CC-4477 was assembled after Emperor Palpatine sensed his new Sith apprentice, Darth Vader, was in trouble. The squad traveled to Mustafar aboard a Theta-class T-2c shuttle alongside the Emperor and searched for Vader. CC-4477 and two troopers found Vader near a lava river, and left under the orders of the Emperor to bring a medical capsule.
